business.headline: Ripple CEO claims US SEC to drop appeal against crypto firmRipple CEO, the company behind XRP, announced on X that the US Securities and Exchange Commission will drop its appeal against Ripple Labs.
Wall Street drifts higher ahead of Fed announcementUS stocks showed marginal gains on Wednesday morning as Wall Street waits for the Federal Reserve's announcement.

US markets rise ahead of key Fed interest rate decisionAt the opening bell, the Dow Jones Industrial Average rose 84.73 points to 41,666.04. The S&P 500 gained 18.29 points, reaching 5,632.95, while the Nasdaq Composite climbed 84.20 points to 17,588.32.
Government to continue footing the bill for UPI payments under Rs 2,000The scheme covers transactions up to Rs 2,000 and will be in place for one year, from April 1, 2024, to March 31, 2025.
India's first Trump-branded office project to be built in Pune. Check detailsOver the past decade, India has emerged as the largest international market for Trump-branded real estate.

Sensex, Nifty extend positive streak, but IT and FMCG stocks limit market gainsThe S&P BSE Sensex gained 147.79 points to settle at 75,449.05, while the NSE Nifty50 added 73.30 points to close at 22,907.60.

REC shares rise after board clears 4th interim dividend for FY25. Check detailsREC Dividend: The company announced a dividend payout of Rs 3.6 per share, taking the total dividend declared so far in FY25 to Rs 15.4 per share.

Zomato shares surge over 4% as rally continues for 2nd day. What next?At 12:50 pm, shares of Zomato were up 4.12% to Rs 227.35 on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE). It may be noted that Zomato shares are rising despite the possibility that it could face an old insolvency plea.

PhysicsWallah IPO: Edtech firm files for Rs 4,600 crore public listingPhysicsWallah IPO: The edtech company has taken the confidential pre-filing route, a method that allows companies to submit their IPO documents to the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Sebi) without making financial details public immediately.

SAIL shares jump 4% today as steel stocks gain. Should you buy?SAIL shares gained 4% during the intraday trading session, following a broad-based rally in steel stock prices. Read to find out if the company's stock is likely to gain further.

Missed Rs 5,000 SIP in top Nifty stocks 5 years ago? Returns may surprise youDespite the recent correction, a systematic investment plan (SIP) in top Nifty50 stocks over the past five years would have still delivered strong returns.

TCS, Infosys, HCLTech: Why major IT stocks are falling todayShares of TCS and Infosys dropped 2%, while other IT names like HCLTech, Tech Mahindra, LTIMindtree, and Coforge also traded in the red. The Nifty IT index, which had been gaining for the last three sessions, was the worst-performing sectoral index in morning trade.

entertainment.headline: Victoria Beckham's stunning wedding dress for Nicole Brydon Bloom unveiledVictoria Beckham crafted a custom lace wedding dress for Nicole Brydon Bloom, featuring hand-sewn floral details. The gown debuted at Bloom and Justin Theroux's beach wedding, showcasing Beckham's timeless design aesthetic.

Punisher returns in 'Daredevil: Born Again' for explosive showdownFrank Castle, aka the Punisher, returns in Daredevil: Born Again, sparking a tense confrontation with Matt Murdock amid an ongoing murder investigation. Meanwhile, new suspects emerge in White Tiger's death.

Why Heather Thomas left Hollywood: The stalker nightmare that drove her awayHeather Thomas left Hollywood after enduring stalkers, break-ins, and death threats. She revealed the harrowing experiences that forced her into hiding and the challenges women face in the entertainment industry.

Kelly Clarkson returns to talk show after two-week absence – Here's whyKelly Clarkson returned to The Kelly Clarkson Show after a two-week absence due to a personal issue. Guest hosts covered for her, and she is now preparing for her Las Vegas residency.

Severance Season 2 Finale: Release date, runtime & what to expectThe Severance Season 2 finale airs March 20 on Apple TV+. With its sci-fi corporate thriller concept and gripping plot, the show remains a fan favorite. Season 3 is already in development.

Kevin Hart becomes World's highest-paid comedian in 2024, earning $81 millionKevin Hart became the world's highest-paid comedian in 2024, earning $81 million. His diversified portfolio—including films, streaming series, stand-up, and endorsements—helped him surpass stars like Jerry Seinfeld, Tom Cruise, and Hugh Jackman.

Taylor Swift teases Reputation era? Fans decode snake necklace at iHeart Awards 2025Taylor Swift made a surprise virtual appearance at the iHeartRadio Music Awards 2025, sparking speculation about Reputation (Taylor's Version) after wearing a snake choker, a nod to her iconic 2017 album.

Mariah Carey and Anderson .Paak Dating? iHeartRadio Music awards appearance sparks rumoursMariah Carey and Anderson .Paak reignite dating rumours after attending the 2025 iHeartRadio Music Awards together. Meanwhile, Mariah's speech references her past with Tommy Mottola, sparking further discussion about her early career struggles.
John Wick Ballerina trailer: Ana de Armas faces off Keanu ReevesThe second trailer of the highly anticipated John Wick spin-off, Ballerina, is here. And it promises loads of action and thrill.

Esha Deol on link-up rumours with Ajay Devgn: That was so weirdEsha Deol discussed past link-up rumours, including those with Ajay Devgn. She said it was weird and said their bond was more about respect and admiration for each other.

Actor Jonathan Majors wants to come back to Marvel, play Kang the Conqueror againActor Jonathan Majors is open to coming back to the world of Marvel movies again. Majors had been largely boycotted by the industry after his domestic abuse allegations.

Actor Parvathy on her role in Ullozhukku: I feel empowered because of AnjuDuring a recent interview, Malayalam actor Parvathy Thiruvothu shared her experience of filming for the role of Anju in the film Ullozhukku, for which she was nominated in the Best Supporting Actress category at the Critics' Choice Awards 2025.

Karma trailer: Shin Min-ah, Kim Hae-soo are at the centre of web of liesNetflix unveils Karma, a gripping Korean drama interweaving crime and fate. Starring a stellar cast, the series will explore deep connection between six different individuals and hidden truths.

Director-animator Shigeki Awai, man behind Naruto and One Piece, dies at 71Shigeki Awai, a legendary animator and director known for his extensive contributions to anime, died at the age of 71. Hideaki Matsuoka and Tsutomu Ohno paid tribute to him.

Elvish Yadav trolled for age-shaming Ankita Lokhande: Will you play Alia's mother?YouTuber Elvish Yadav recently faced online criticism after he openly age-shamed actor Ankita Lokhande. A video from a show where Yadav served the host has gone viral.

Mohanlal's Lucifer entry scene inspired by Rajinikanth: Prithviraj SukumaranMalayalam actor-director Prithviraj Sukumaran, who has been busy promoting his upcoming film L2: Empuraan, recently revealed that he took inspiration from Rajinikanth to design the entry scene of Mohanlal in the 2019 blockbuster film, Lucifer.

Composer Thaman on why Game Changer songs weren't popular: Lacked hook stepsDuring a recent interview, music composer Thaman opened up about his experience making music for Shankar's Game Changer, which starred Ram Charan and Kiara Advani. The film received negative reviews.
Director accused of stealing $11M from Netflix for a show that never aired Netflix had initially paid about $44 million to purchase an unfinished show called White Horse from Rinsch

Deepika Padukone is 'figuring out' how to return to work without mother's guiltActor Deepika Padukone recently spoke about her daughter Dua and how she is still figuring out between motherhood and work. The actor added how motherhood has influenced the kind of roles and movies she will pick now.

general news.headline: Farmers clash with Punjab cops, Jagjit Dallewal detained, protest sites razedSeveral farmers clashed with Punjab Police in Mohali while heading towards the protest sites of Khanauri and Shambhu borders. The Punjab Police, meanwhile, began dismantling tents by using bulldozers at the sites.

Hang her: Parents of Meerut woman who killed husband, hid body in cement drumThe father of the Meerut woman, who along with her lover, are accused of killing her husband and hiding his chopped body in a cement-filled drum, said she could not live without drugs and wanted to get rid of him.

After Putin, Trump speaks to Zelenskyy: Calls aimed to align Russia, Ukraine needsUS President Donald Trump described his call with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy as "very good," following his discussions with Russian President Vladimir Putin on Tuesday.

IndiaToday.in's Sibu Tripathi, 3 other India Today journalists win Ramnath Goenka awardFour journalists from India Today received the Ramnath Goenka Award for journalism. Awardees include Sibu Tripathi for Joshimath reporting, Mridulika Jha for migration stories, Ashutosh Mishra for Manipur violence coverage, and Siddhant Mohan for 'The Kerala Story'.
Instagram says rubbing raw ginger can cure acne. Do dermatologists agree?Rubbing raw ginger directly on your skin isn't exactly a glow-up move – it could make things worse.

Hamas must give up power or Israel will take over Gaza: Israeli envoy Reuven AzarIsrael's Ambassador to India Reuven Azar said Israel had been waiting for a "long time" for Hamas to release the remaining hostages. He justified the military pressure on the Palestinian group to achieve a diplomatic solution to end the war.

US faces housing crisis. Why Elon Musk's DOGE is to blameThe US is staring at a housing crisis after Elon Musk's DOGE halted federal housing projects, cutting $30 million in grants, worsening affordability, and stalling 1,000+ programs.

Outrage over Tamil Nadu schoolgirls cleaning toilets, headmaster suspendedA viral video of schoolgirls cleaning toilets at a Tamil Nadu government school sparked outrage. Authorities suspended the headmaster and BJP criticised the state's education model under Chief Minister MK Stalin.

The IPL story, Part 1: Power, politics, and cricket in its origin sagaThe Indian Premier League's origin story is one of power, politics, and ambition, driven by Lalit Modi's vision. From political maneuvering to the league's explosive rise, it set the stage for a saga of success and scandal.

Indian Green Card holders face deportation risk: Their rights and recourseGreen Card holders, including Indians, are facing never-before-seen scrutiny as the Trump administration walks the talk on citizenship, immigration and deportation. What are the rights of American Green Card holders, and what legal recourse do they have if they are threatened with deportation?

US Supreme Court likely to review 26/11 accused Tahawwur Rana's extradition pleaThe US Supreme Court is expected to review Tahawwur Rana's plea seeking a stay on his extradition to India. Judges will consider the application during a private conference on April 4, 2025. Rana's earlier review petition was rejected on March 6 by Justice Kagan, after which he filed a fresh plea for consideration by the Chief Justice.

Ageless Sunil Chhetri shines as India maul Maldives 3-0 in friendlySunil Chhetri marked his international return with India's 3-0 win over Maldives, contributing to a dominant performance and showing signs of his old brilliance.

Chahal complied with divorce consent terms: High Court on Rs 4.75 crore alimonyThe Bombay High Court overturned a family court decision that denied the request to waive the statutory cooling-off period for the divorce of cricketer Yuzvendra Chahal and Dhanashree Verma. It directed the family court to decide the divorce petition by Thursday, March 20.

Nagpur riots mastermind Fahim Khan arrested, caught on camera spreading rumoursPolice have named Fahim Khan as the mastermind of the Nagpur violence, alleging that his inflammatory speech triggered the clashes, leaving several injured and sparking large-scale unrest.

Indian-origin student Divya Tyagi solves century-old Math problem, boosts wind energyAccording to the official website of Penn State University, Divya Tyagi  refined the work of British aerodynamicist Hermann Glauert, whose research focused on the maximum attainable power coefficient of wind turbines.

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP.
